name: 史蒂芬·格雷比尔
name_full: 史蒂芬·格雷比尔 Stephen Graybill
birth_place: 美国,田纳西州,纳什维尔
introduction: Stephen studied Theater at Oxford University at The British Drama Academy, Improv with The Upright Citizens Brigade in NYC and The Groundlings in Los Angeles, as well as at The Actors Center in New York City before it closed.He has performed on the stage all over New York City with Woodshed Collective, Studio 42, F*IT Club (founding member), Drama Dept, Primary Stages, The New York Fringe Festival, New York Musical Theatre Festival; outside of New York with Shakespeare on the Sound, The Shakespeare Theater in DC, Connecticut Repertory Theatre (awarded a Connecticut Critics Circle Performance Award), and JENA Company.Stephen's voice can be heard on campaigns for products like Dell, Tropicana, Progressive, Citibank, GM, Hilton, UBC, Vicks, The Wall Street Journal, Align, Buitoni, Cannes, Chevy Chase Bank, Sanofi Aventis, and UBS.Stephen has shared the stage as a singer/songwriter most notably with Roberta Flack, at The Sundance Film Festival in Amstel Light's Legacy Lounge, and with Naked Angels in New York City.
